name: Kesko Corporation
membership: Federation of Finnish Commerce, BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative), Independent Retail Europe, Finnish Chambers of Commerce, EuroCommerce
goal: Kesko Corporation is a listed trading sector company. It manages retail store chains and efficiently produces services for retail store chains' purchasing, logistics, network development and data management. Kesko's operations include grocery trade, building and technical trade and car trade. Its divisions and chains act in close cooperation with retailer entrepreneurs and other partners. Kesko has about 2,000 stores engaged in chain operations in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland and Belarus.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Retail action plan, supply chain, labeling rules, product safety, payment systems, competition law, company law and corporate governance
